summary: Antoine Doinel is 17, lives in a hotel and works in a factory making records; he loves music. He falls in love with a woman he meets at a concert. She sees him as a friend, but her parents love him.
cast: Jean-Pierre Léaud|Marie-France Pisier|Patrick Auffay|Jean-François Adam|François Darbon|Pierre Schaeffer|Rosy Varte
keywords: character names as title|antoine doinel character|three word title|love|parents
title: Antoine et Colette
